content: The limit is reached for storage space and the number of rooms

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message when the user's storage space and room limit have reached their maximum capacity. It appears as a header in a quota bar component, likely on a dashboard or settings page, and informs the user of the limit that has been reached.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'The limit is reached' is not accurately conveyed by 'limitinə çatıldı'. A more accurate translation would be 'limitə çatıb' or 'maksimuma çatdır'.  'Limitinə çatıldı' implies the limit has *been* reached and remains so, whereas the English suggests a state change.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Yaddaş sahəsi və otaq sayı limitə çatıb

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'The limit is reached' is better conveyed as 'has been reached' or 'is exhausted' in Armenian to accurately reflect the passive sense of the original.  The current translation, 'սպառվել է' (sparel e), is grammatically correct but might imply a more active depletion rather than a passive reaching of a limit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Պահեստային տարածքի և սենյակների քանակի սահմանաչափը լրացվել է (Pahisti tarazdgi ev senyakneri qanaki sahamachapn lratcel e) or Պահեստային տարածքի և սենյակների քանակի սահմանաչափը սպառվել է (Pahisti tarazdgi ev senyakneri qanaki sahamachapn sparel e) - the latter is acceptable, but the former offers better nuance.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ເກືອບເຕັມຂີດສຸດສາລີ' (geuap tem khit sut sali) translates to 'almost full limit' instead of 'reached the limit'. The English text indicates the limit *has* been reached, not just that it's near the limit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເກືອບເຕັມສູງສຸດສໍາລັບເນື້ອທີ່ເກັບຮັກສາ ແລະ ຈຳນວນຫ້ອງ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ຫ້ອງ' (room) is spelled correctly, but its usage could be improved for clarity depending on the specific context. Consider if 'ຫ້ອງພັກ' (rooms for staying) is more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'ຫ້ອງພັກ' if referring to rooms for living/staying. Otherwise, 'ຫ້ອງ' is acceptable.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'rooms' is translated as 'divisões'. While 'divisões' can mean rooms, in this context referring to game progress, 'quartos' would be a more natural and common translation. 'Divisões' is more commonly used for partitions or divisions within a larger space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: É atingido o limite do espaço de armazenamento e do número de quartos

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation "Limita maximă permisă de stocare și de săli a fost atinsă" is a bit too formal and wordy. A more natural and concise translation would better reflect the original meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Limita de stocare și de camere a fost atinsă.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'sali' is less common than 'camere' in this context referring to rooms/spaces.

The translation 'ධාරිතාව ඉකුත්වී ඇති අතර ගබඩා අවකාශය සහ කාමර සංඛ්‍යාව ද ඉකුත්වී ඇත.' is a bit verbose and could be more concise. A more natural translation might focus on the overall message of reaching a limit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ධාරිතාව පිරී ඇති අතර, ගබඩා අවකාශය සහ කාමර සංඛ්‍යාවද.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'ද' (da) at the end of 'කාමර සංඛ්‍යාවද' while grammatically correct, adds unnecessary emphasis. Removing it would make the sentence flow better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ධාරිතාව පිරී ඇති අතර, ගබඩා අවකාශය සහ කාමර සංඛ්‍යාව.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Limit pre úložný priestor a počet miestností je dosiahnutý' is a literal translation but sounds unnatural in Slovak. A more natural phrasing would convey that the limit *has been reached*. The word 'dosiahnutý' implies achieving something, whereas 'reached' implies a boundary being hit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Limit úložného priestoru a počtu miestností je prekročený.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'The limit is reached' translates more naturally to 'Postignut je limit' in Serbian (Latin). 'Dostignut je limit' implies achieving something, not reaching a limit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Postignut je limit za skladišni prostor i broj prostorija

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'The limit is reached' implies that the maximum has been attained. While 'sınıra ulaşıldı' can mean 'the limit has been reached', it doesn't capture the same sense of having fully exhausted the allowance. A better translation might be 'Dolu' (full) or 'Maksimum doluluk' (maximum capacity).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Depolama alanı ve oda sayısı maksimuma ulaşıldı
